H0.text: where do the secretory cells of endocrine glands secrete their products. Lymphatic system

H1.text: where do the secretory cells of endocrine glands secrete their products. Interstitial fluid

H2.text: where do the secretory cells of endocrine glands secrete their products. Cerebrospinal fluid

H3.text: where do the secretory cells of endocrine glands secrete their products. bloodstream

A4.text: Endocrine glands secrete their products, hormones, directly into interstitial spaces where they are absorbed into blood rather than through a duct.
